info.name: nginx version detect
info.author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: carbure.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: carbure.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:

info.description: MySQL instance with enabled native password support prone vulnerable for password brute-force attack.
info.name: MySQL DB with enabled native password
info.author: iamthefrogy
